parameters.query: SELECT * FROM portfolio_summary ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM paper_positions ORDER BY unrealized_pnl DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT ON (symbol) * FROM signals ORDER BY symbol, timestamp DESC LIMIT 50;
SELECT * FROM strategy_breakdown ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trade_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM market_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 100;
